original_text:
Praise be to the Lord,
    for he showed me the wonders of his love
    when I was in a city under siege.
korean_text: 여호와를 찬송할지어다 견고한 성에서 그의 놀라운 사랑을 내게 보이셨음이로다

sentences.original_text: for he showed me the wonders of his love
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 사랑의 기이한 일들을 내게 보이셨기 때문이니

sentences.original_text: when I was in a city under siege
